Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood, South Chicago and over regular route, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Halsted/Division
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via Division, Halsted, North Avenue, Ashland and Division due to street blockage near Halsted/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Halsted, North Avenue, Ashland, then resume their normal route on Division due to street blockage near Halsted/Division.

Allow extra travel time.
